title: Poro IP icon option not showing
body: simple as that. it's not there...

replies.body: Hiya! Gifting of Mystery Snowball Icons is temporarily disabled while we investigate issues with the store.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Xl0hhlVH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-12-10T18:23:35.570+0000)
>
> Hiya! Gifting of Mystery Snowball Icons is temporarily disabled while we investigate issues with the store.

whew I was going to have a panic attack... because I MUST HAVE THE CUTE PENGUINS AND SPREAD THE LOVE OF PENGUINS.
I'm patiently waiting to throw penguins at people. ^-^
Do you mean the gifting poro icon that you send to friends? I don't see it either on NA.
only the "Icy Minion Icon" has an IP option. The rest of the icons cost RP
70k Ip means I can throw 7 thousand peinguins :D
